title: Xamarin forms Korean
body:
I used on xamarin forms android, ios but couldn't drawing korean string with device default font family.
And i do not want use custom typeface.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
There are two parts to this:

1. Make sure you have a typeface that has the character:
   Basically, use this to get a typeface: `SKFontManager.MatchCharacter(...)`
   https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/232#issuecomment-277458753
2. Supporting right-to-left and top-to-bottom strings:
   See more info on issue #272

comments.author: mattleibow
